information: plastship is a trade and services platform for suppliers and purchasers of ground materials, regranulates, compounds and soon also additives for customising recyclate properties, as well as accompanying services for the plastics recycling and plastics processing industry. The platform is available in German and English. On plastship, overcapacity quantities and off-spec materials can just as easily be stored and requested as typical regranulate goods from continuous production. All raw materials can be prepared and searched on the basis of their specifications and properties. Plastics processors also have the opportunity to find fixed buyers for their production wastes or payroll services. Also integrated in the portal is the opportunity to place corresponding tenders if a search does not directly lead to a result. All available quote and search functions can be used free of charge.
